params.OCR_probeID:type: contents of bounding box of OCR_probeID should be of this type
params.OCR_probeID:xywh: bounding box of probeID if specified, this will be used as identifier for values, else from dicom headers
params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.cluster_mode: mode of connected components analysis; either all_middle (def) or largest_only
params.fitcircle_frac: use only this central fraction for circle fitting
params.hor_offset: default lines to exclude from left and right when making profiles (10)
params.ocr_threshold: threshold on pixel values to remove background gradient (0)
params.sen_delta: a peak in sensitivity profile must be at least <fdelta>*(max-noise)
params.sen_filter: running average of this width for sensitivity data
params.signal_thresh: threshold on pixelvalues for reverberation patterns; use>0 for noisy data (0)
params.uni_delta: a dip in normalized reverb pattern must be at least <delta>
params.uni_depth: depth in mm of size of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (5)
params.uni_filter: running average of this width before peak detection
params.uni_range_model: method to determine y-range for uniformity profile. absolute/skip10pct/skip20pct/maxsenslimit (absolute)
params.uni_start: offset in mm to start of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (2)
params.ver_offset: default lines to exclude from top and bottom when making profiles (10)
